name: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM XML Template
summary: A CDTX file is a diagram template saved in the XML standard and created by ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, a diagram-creating application. It stores information about a diagram, such as shapes, text, lines, symbols, and metadata . CDTX files are similar to the more common .CDT files, but store information in the easier-to-read XML format instead of binary format, making transferring template information more convenient.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
